item.description:
Allan Hughes, DC will be facilitating.

In a world of uncertainty, it's easy to let fear prevent you from living a full, rich life. By learning to meditate, you gain the key to personal courage and inner transformation.

Join the teleseminar on Wednesday the 11th---
Call: 1-712-432-3900. When prompted, enter your access code: 1617505 followed by the # sign.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Teleseminar -- Overcoming Fear
